Interface AcmeRandomnessSingletonLocal

    public interface AcmeRandomnessSingletonLocal
    Source of required randomness used in the ACME protocol.

    • Method Detail

      • generateAcmeChallengeToken

        String generateAcmeChallengeToken()
        https://tools.ietf.org/html/draft-ietf-acme-acme-12#section-8.3 " token (required, string): A random value that uniquely identifies the challenge. This value MUST have at least 128 bits of entropy. It MUST NOT contain any characters outside the base64url alphabet, and MUST NOT include base64 padding characters ("=")." 128 bits = 16 bytes
        Returns:
        token

      • generateAcmeOrderEnrollmentCode

        String generateAcmeOrderEnrollmentCode()
        Returns:
        the end entity password used to finalize the ACME order
